entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Vsix explorer does not show code issues in updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis #76589
  • Bad error report when using uninitialized variable in a local function: "Use of possibly unassigned field '_dummyPrimitive'" #76586
  • API Proposal: `IncrementalGeneratorPostInitializationContext.AddEmbeddedAttributeDefinition` #76584
  • Can not suppress warnings and can not proceed with build #76581

PullRequests

Created

  • Forbid unsafe types in records #76588
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cleanup Extract method code (part 3) #76587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Continued Extract method cleanup (part 2) #76585
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add EmbeddedAttribute API for source generators #76583
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • Reproduce and fix 'Use expression body' indenting new expression body oddly #76582
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Propagate marked attributes to synthesized fields. #76567
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow users to define EmbeddedAttribute #76523
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Language Feature Status.md: correct dictionary expressions entries #76574
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Document breaks due to preferring ReadOnlySpan over Span #76572
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types
  • CSharpIndentationService simplification #76580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
